title: mastery lvl 6 token not awarded after S game
body:
Hi there, Just wanted to note that I did not recieve a mastery lvl 6 token after an S rated game on Jax in twisted treeline. I thought that with the new patch masteries were awarded for all the standard game modes?

Thanks

replies.body: Mastery points are awarded for all gamemodes (which will get you up to Mastery 5), but you can only get Mastery 6 and 7 tokens on Normal and Ranked SR.
